name: Eventide - Tower Defense
description:
Grab your bow, and get ready for battle. 

As the eventides, you seek your glory as the one to protect the town of Crisitan. As the shadows peak in, the undead rise. Protect the kingdom and stand guard as a hero!

This arcade style tower bow defense game puts you in the battle. Fight 9 waves of monsters, trolls and skeletons in an action packed virtual reality adventure, destined to find your own glory. 

THIS GAME IS IN ITS FIRST ALPHA.

 Please feel free to comment any changes, suggestions, or donate to help us add even more! See you in the eventide.

** AVAILABLE FOR THE OCULUS QUEST THROUGH SIDEQUEST **
